feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:07 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 11:00 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Temperature: 1.1°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Humidity: 79 %
Dewpoint: -2.2°C
Wind: S 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with flurries or periods of rain. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries or periods of rain changing to periods of rain or drizzle near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 1. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries changing to snow at times heavy near midnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. High zero. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow. Windy. High minus 6. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
